resources.string: Hello Guys, This is Jitendra Kohar, A Web developer as well as an Android developer. Currently, pursuing a Bachelors degree in engineering at India recognized university, VTU, Bangalore. I am from Lumbini, Nepal. My strength is sincerely hardworking and self-motivated, I can adapt to any type of environment. My hobbies are Exploring a few things and playing badminton. My short term goal is first to get a job and settled myself. My long-term goal is to reach the highest position in the company.
